plugin_info.plugin_description: Export a timeseries to a HEC DSS file
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox stephen.knox@manchester.ac.uk (c) Copyright 2015, University of Manchester For more information visit www.hydra-network.com

arg.name: Target folder
arg.help: The folder that will contain the output. Defaults to the desktop.

arg.name: Target file
arg.help: The file to be exported. Defaults to "output_" plus the export time.

arg.name: Data Collection ID
arg.help: The name of the dataset collection into which all the timeseries will be put

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config
